ygData.subject: RE: I hate figuring out these riddles can someone  please spell...
ygData.msgSnippet: I m actually interested to the allusion (from the text) that mixing different amounts of water can cause a different (not necessarily good) effect.  I wonder
ygData.messageBody:
I'm actually interested to the allusion (from the text) that mixing
different amounts of water can cause a different (not necessarily good)
effect. I wonder if there's a subtle variation that creates gnomish
dynamite or some such. If so, I hope gnome bombers have more sense than the
goblin variety.

-----Original Message-----
From: Nilen23@...

Well for the fireworks i got the ingredients: water, gnomish spirits, bat
wing, and metal shaft. hope thats right

and collpasible fishing pole i got: 3 metal rods and gnomish bolts. haven't
had a chance to check these yet though
